data.name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle - Very Sharp Eye
data.detailed_description:
Very Sharp Eye

When we pay attention to our surroundings, we discover a whole world full of details that we may not have noticed - our lives depend on our brain's ability to perceive and process information as quickly as possible. We could not safely perform many of our daily tasks without being able to focus on more than one thing at a time. When you drive, you need to pay attention to the road conditions, all the cars around you and any potential problems that may suddenly arise in front of us. Being able to focus on different things in a large field of view is a major factor in determining whether sooner or later we can identify a problem and be able to make a decision in time to physically respond. The older we get, the worse our visual attention becomes as a result of changes in the brain. These changes make it difficult for us to see objects anywhere, even in front of us. Despite the fact that our visual ability has been shown to degrade with age, the process can be cancelled through the use of specially designed training programs for the brain.

Features

  • Improve Peripheral vision
  • Improve Driving safely
  • Progress graph for game for tracking
  • Leaderboards
